name: Merge Fruits
description:
Colorful fruits, merging fun!
If you meet one of the following conditions, don’t miss this game!
--Have a preference for merge games
--Feel better when see fruits
--Need a game to kill time
--Looking for a way to relax your brain and eyeballs
Merge Fruits is a game easy to play but full of fun. The only thing you need to do is swiping to control the location of the fruit’s fall. The fallen fruits are merged according to certain rules: Two same fruits will be merged into one bigger fruit — until you reach the top of the synthesis chain — a super big watermelon! In addition, there are more modes waiting for you to explore. Infinite possibility makes this game infinite fun. Let’s have fun with friends!
MERGE FRUITS GAME FEATURES:
--Easy-to play but extremely funny
--Fresh and juicy art style
--Wonderful merge experience
--Multiple modes increase playability
--Support sharing, multiple fun
